definition: بله baliha a to be stupid, simple-minded VI to feign foolishness, pretend to be stupid X to deem (هـ s.o.) stupid or simple-minded بله balah and بلاهة balāha stupidity, foolishness, simple-mindedness; idiocy, imbecility│بلاهة مبكرة (mubakkira) dementia praecox بله balha let alone, not to speak of, not to mention
